name: letterboxd_scrape_film
description: Scrape a Letterboxd film page. Returns title, year, director, rating, description, genres, and cast.

steps.code: const title = document.querySelector('h1.primaryname span.name, h1.filmtitle, h1')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const year = document.querySelector('div.releaseyear a, small.number a')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const director = document.querySelector('a.text-sluglist[href*="/director/"], span.text-sluglist a, a[href*="/director/"]')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const rating = document.querySelector('span.average-rating a, span.average-rating')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const tagline = document.querySelector('div.tagline')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const desc = document.querySelector('div.truncate p, div.body-text p')?.textContent?.trim()?.substring(0,1000)||''; const genres = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('div#tab-genres a, a[href*="/films/genre/"]')).map(g=>g.textContent.trim()); const cast = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('div#tab-cast a.tooltip, a[href*="/actor/"]')).slice(0,15).map(a=>a.textContent.trim()); return { title, year, director, rating, tagline, description: desc, genres, cast, url: window.location.href }
